articles.description: The bottom line is that if anything strange or unusual is happening with your health, or the health of someone you love, take it seriously.
articles.content: Cancer is a horrible beast, and I dont know anyone who hasnt been affected by it in some way. Lung cancer, in particular, is one of the worst cancers out there. Its one of the most common cancersthe … [+4708 chars]
